mapper.insert: insert into music(title, singer, lyric, composition, company, album, lyric_data, duration, file_path, uploader_id, bitrate, code_type, format) values(#{title}, #{singer}, #{lyric}, #{composition}, #{company}, #{album}, #{lyric_data}, #{duration}, #{file_path}, #{uploader_id}, #{bitrate}, #{codeType}, #{format})
mapper.select: select title, singer, lyric, composition, company, album, lyric_data, duration, file_path, uploader_id, bitrate, code_type, format from music limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
